name: Text1
text: Take a look. This is my reality. And it will become a little bit more depressive if I will stay here.

name: Text2
text: And here is another part of it - a society that drinks and wouldn't accept any other behavior. I am so sick of it! But may be there is other way.

name: Text3
text: Right, Simon? Grab your high school diploma and apply to the university in the capital. Oh, train departs, hurry!
